languages.text: [Пожать плечами] "Все гости, которым не по нраву мои тщетные развлечения и греховные забавы, вольны покинуть Даргонус в любой момент".
[Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."
languages.original_text: [Пожать плечами] "Все гости, которым не по нраву мои тщетные развлечения и греховные забавы, вольны покинуть Даргонус в любой момент".

traits.locale_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and sinful fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."
[Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and sinful fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."
[Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and sinful fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."
[Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

languages.text: [肩をすくめる]「退屈な歓待と不遜な道楽を嫌うゲストは、いつでも自由にダルゴナスからお帰りいただいて構わない」
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [肩をすくめる]「退屈な歓待と罪深い道楽を嫌うゲストは、いつでも自由にダルゴナスからお帰りいただいて構わない」

languages.text: [耸耸肩]“若是有谁不喜欢空虚的玩乐和亵渎的消遣，大可以随时离开达戈努斯。”
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [耸耸肩]“若是有谁不喜欢空虚的玩乐和亵渎的消遣，大可以随时离开达戈努斯。”

languages.text: [Encogerte de hombros] «Cualquier invitado a quien mis entretenimientos insípidos y mi diversión irreverente no le gusten puede marcharse de Dargonus cuando quiera».
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [Encogerte de hombros] «Cualquier invitado a quien mis entretenimientos insípidos y mi diversión irreverente no le gusten puede marcharse de Dargonus cuando quiera».

languages.text: [Hausser les épaules] « Tout invité qui trouverait mes divertissements fades et mes loisirs irrévérencieux est libre de quitter Dargonus quand bon lui semble. »
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [Hausser les épaules] « Tout invité qui trouverait mes divertissements fades et mes loisirs irrévérencieux est libre de quitter Dargonus quand bon lui semble. »

languages.text: [Mit den Schultern zucken] "Alle Gäste, die mein oberflächliches Unterhaltungsprogramm und den respektlosen Spaß nicht mögen, können Dargonus jederzeit verlassen."
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [Mit den Schultern zucken] "Alle Gäste, die mein oberflächliches Unterhaltungsprogramm und den respektlosen Spaß nicht mögen, können Dargonus jederzeit verlassen."

languages.text: [Omzunu silk] "Boş eğlencelerim ile patavatsız zevklerimden hoşlanmayan, dilediği zaman Dargonus'tan gidebilir."
languages.original_text: [Shrug] "Any guests who dislike my vapid entertainments and irreverent fun are free to leave Dargonus at any time."

traits.locale_text: [Omzunu silk] "Boş eğlencelerim ile patavatsız zevklerimden hoşlanmayan dilediği gibi Dargonus'tan gidebilir."
